message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms suggest allergic rhinitis and intranasal fluticasone, a steroid nasal spray, is a common treatment for this condition. Intravenous penicillin and oral amoxicillin are antibiotics, which are not indicated for allergic rhinitis. Oral acetaminophen is a pain reliever and does not treat the underlying condition.
